name: pouchdb-list
description: A PouchDB plug-in that allows you to re-use your CouchDB list functions on the client side.
author: Marten de Vries

scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -g es3ify -s List -o dist/pouchdb-list.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js; cd dist; uglifyjs pouchdb-list.js -mc > pouchdb-list.min.js
